nodes.text: The Horned Throne was the ceremonial seat of the ruler of Sintheti.

In 402 BBY, several individuals became involved in a succession dispute and made claim to the Horned Throne. Their factions hired mercenary groups like the Mandalorians and the Thyrsus Sun Guard to fight for their respective sides. The Guard and the Mandalorians clashed in what would become a three-year conflict known as the Battle of Sintheti.
